sourcesContent:
export const questions = [

   
{
    question : " What is the primary advantage for using trucking in shipping ?",
    options: [
    {answerText: "Faster Shipping Times" , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "Greater Flexibility of Shipping Routes" , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "  Low Transportation costs " , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "  Reduced risk of damage to goods" , isCorrect: false}],
    
},
{
question : " To transport hazardous materials, what  measure  you shouldn’t prefer ?",
options: [
    {answerText: " Proper handling and storage" , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "Ensuring Proper labelling" , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "Overloading" , isCorrect: false},
    {answerText: "Transportation regulations compliance " , isCorrect: false}],
    
},
    
{
    question : " What  qualities of a freight driver are important for safe transport ?",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Safety consciousness " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Flexibility and Adaptability " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Strong Communication skills " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "All of the above " , isCorrect: false}],
        
    },
{
    question : "How do you build and maintain relationships with clients and other professionals in the industry ?",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Communicate effectively " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: " Improving network " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Provide Excellent Service " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "rvice  " , isCorrect: false}], 
    },
{
    question : "What method of communication shouldn’t be preferred for communicating with drivers on the road  during transport ?",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Using Headlights " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Using Electronic devices " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Using CB radios" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Using Hand Signals " , isCorrect: false}],
        
    
},
{
    question : "How do you handle the situation of delays during the transport ?",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Plan for contingencies" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Communicate with dispatch and customer " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: " Maintain Professionalism  " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: " All of the above  " , isCorrect: false}],
        
    
},

{
    question : "How do you handle unexpected situations during transport ,such as inclement weather or road closures ",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Taking unnecessary risks " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "In bad weather conditions , it is important to prioritise safety  over speed." , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Ignoring warnings or advisories" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Failing to communicate with dispatch" , isCorrect: false}],
        
    
},
{
    question : " How do you manage your time and schedule when transporting freight?",
    
    options: [
        {answerText: "Increase the speed of the vehicle for faster transportation .  " , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "using GPS devices or routing software for finding the most efficient route." , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Communicate with dispatch" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Both b & c  " , isCorrect: false}],
        
    
},
{
    question : " At what  speed limit would you prefer  for transporting heavy goods through a truck? (Km/hr) ",
    options: [
        {answerText: "140-150" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "88-113" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "120-130" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "130-140" , isCorrect: false}],
        
    },

{
    question : " Which of the following  is a potential disadvantage of using rail freight for shipping ? ",
    options: [
        {answerText: "Limited shipping Capacity" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "High Transportation costs" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Longer shippping times" , isCorrect: false},
        {answerText: "Increases risk of damage to goods" , isCorrect: false}],
        
    
}


];
